nodes.text: A flewt was a species of predatory butterfly that was found on Naboo.
Circa 1 ABY, Kippy Martin asked a spacer to kill starving flewts that bothered her in the Gallo Mountains.
Flewts appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
